item.title: Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

I think this is how it goes.

npcdrop = 1966	2412	1	15

1st number is the id of the monster
2nd number is the item
3rd number is how many
4th number is the percent chance to get it

so the 1966 monster would drop 2412 item and 1 of it with a 15% chance to get it

Read full topic
